item.title: Need help with command!
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

public void WriteWildyLevel() { checkwildy2(); if (inwildy2 && !ib() && !isInBank() && !IsDead) { //int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; int level = (combat - 25); int High = (combat + 25); outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("" + level + "-" + High + "", 199); leftwild = 1; outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); IsInWilderness = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (ib() && isInBank() && !inwildy2) { sendQuest("SAFE", 199); IsInWilderness = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

still -25 25.

item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

omfg this work! rep++!

now your sitll here, and good

When im in wildy ( i have pvp source)
lets take a example
i am combat 50

then it says 25-75 ( you can attack)
in save zone it says -25-25 ( i want to make it called SAFE )

public void WriteWildyLevel() { checkwildy2(); if (inwildy2 && !ib() && !isInBank() && !IsDead) { //int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; int level = (combat - 25); int High = (combat + 25); outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("" + level + "-" + High + "", 199); leftwild = 1; outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); IsInWilderness = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (ib() && isInBank()) { sendQuest("SAFE", 199); } }

ib, inbank means safe zone, i got my safe zone in ib and inbank.
but it doesnt say safe, can you help?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("ags")) { if(pvppoints >= 10999) { addItem(35, 1); pvppoints -= 11000; cluescroll -= 11000; } else { sendMsg("You need 11000 PvP Points!"); } }
